x, a, b = map(int, input().split())

if x - a >= b:
    print(b)
elif x - a < 0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(x - a)


X, A = map(int, input().split())  # map関数で文字列をint型に変換している
if X < A:  # XがAより小さい場合
    print(0)
else:  # それ以外
    print(10)


x, a, b = map(int, input().split())

if abs(x - a) < abs(x - b):
    print('A')
elif abs(x - a) > abs(x - b):
    print('B')
else:
    print(0)


import sys

x, a = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
print(0 if x < a else 10)


from sys import stdin

x, a = map(int, stdin.readline().split())
print(0 if x < a else 10) # 0 or 10

X, A = map(int, input().split())
if X < A:
    print(0)
else:
    print(10)
